label: 096. Madame Baptiste to Bp Patrick Lynch -- March 10, 1860
description: Madame Baptiste writes to Bishop Patrick Lynch renewing her request for advice concerning selling the copyright to the "Ursuline Manual" and asks the Bishop about two potential boarders at the school and convent. March 10, 1860. 2p.

metadata.label: Description

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: JMJ Ursuline Convent. Columbia. S.C. March 10th/60. My dearest Brother, I congratulate you the return of your birthday-- wish you a very happy one & many Joyous returns spent in God's holy service. I was not the only one who went to Holy Communion for you this morning, & of those who did not, many offered their fervent prayers--. I hope you have read my two last letters which I am anxious to get a reply to, about the editor of the Baltimore [Mission?] & our Copy-rights of the Ursuline Manual-- and of Miss [Wevers?], who I have recommended to consult you--. Now I have another advice to ask-- it is about a Miss[End Page 1] Gibbon, whose Father you know, & whose Sister you spoke of coming to us-- I was called to the Parlour to see Mrs Gibbon & Miss Gibbon who said they had seen you in Charleston not long since-- Miss Gibbon wishes to come with her younger sister, & study Latin-- she would like to be parlor boarder --what do you think of it? Please let me know for I promised to consider the subject & write to her-- Revd Father Birmingham told me I might expect to see you very soon, as you were offered to attend the Lancaster Court? soon-- we will pray for the success of your appearance there-- How is Archbp Hughes? We will give him a share in our [illegible] to St Joseph & a general [illegible] (as far as I am concerned it is on your account)-- but it would be amiable & expression of charity to mention it to him--, that is if you like. What about Sr Marys reception on the 25th. I hope you are quite well & will soon have the kindness to give me a reply to my three letters & Pray for us all, especially for your own Sister Ellen Sr Baptiste[End Page 2]
